title: Project Impact of Marriage on Taxes
description: A couple plans to get married and wants to understand how it will affect their combined tax liability (the 'marriage penalty' or 'bonus').

tasks.description: Gather the individual income and deduction information for both partners.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all relevant financial data.

tasks.description: Calculate their tax liability as two single individuals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines their current combined tax burden.

tasks.description: Calculate their projected tax liability as a married couple filing jointly and compare the results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a comparative analysis showing the couple will receive a 'marriage bonus' (pay less tax combined).
